channel.title: Hacking Docker on Lentigo.Net
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking Docker on Lentigo.Net

item.title: Checking Out Docker
item.description: I’ve removed most of the software installed by Homebrew on my Mac and am going to give Docker a try for things like hosting databases and software development environments. One of these days I hope to jettison my server and use container environments to host sites.
